ModMetaData.name: Who's Next? (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Captain Muscles (Nathan Harbour)
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Captain Muscles (Nathan Harbour)s mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2366255005
[img]https://i.imgur.com/pufA0kM.png[/img]
[table] [tr][td][url=https://dsc.gg/mlie][img]https://i.imgur.com/zdzzBrc.png[/img][/url][/td] [td][url=https://github.com/emipa606/WhosNext][img]https://i.imgur.com/kTkpTOE.png[/img][/url][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/WjDSfUn.png[/img][/td] [td][img]https://i.imgur.com/h5VwTNL.png[/img][/td] [/tr] [/table]
[img]https://i.imgur.com/Z4GOv8H.png[/img] [img]https://i.imgur.com/Mi8ecQv.gif[/img]
From the brilliant mind who complained until I made [b]Drop All Inventory[/b] and the glorious muscles that would do anything to make that complaining stop comes:
[h1]Who's Next?[/h1]
[b]Who's Next?[/b] allows the next colonist and previous colonist keys to switch between pawns other than colonists on the current map.
[h2]Instructions[/h2] [hr][/hr] 1. Select a pawn. 2. Press '' or '' to select and center the camera on the previous or next pawn of that type. - Prisoners - Animals (wild) - Animals (belonging to the same faction) - Human pawns of another faction - (Switching between colonists works as normal)
[b]Update 1.0.1:[/b] This function will now also include corpses of the appropriate type when cycling between pawns. [b]Update 1.0.2:[/b] Added settings menu with an option to allow/forbid cycling between living pawns and corpses. (Currently 1.3 only)
[h2]Mods by Captain Muscles[/h2] [hr][/hr] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2307817213][img]https://i.imgur.com/VoByiic.png[/img][/url][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2329172147][img]https://i.imgur.com/74JDWuZ.png[/img][/url][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2362736503][img]https://i.imgur.com/WG8os6d.png[/img][/url][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2375902187][img]https://i.imgur.com/fCN25Ys.png[/img][/url] [img]https://i.imgur.com/PwoNOj4.png[/img] [list] [*] See if the the error persists if you just have this mod and its requirements active. [*] If not, try adding your other mods until it happens again. [*] Post your error-log using [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=818773962]HugsLib[/url] or the standalone [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2873415404]Uploader[/url] and command Ctrl+F12 [*] For best support, please use the Discord-channel for error-reporting. [*] Do not report errors by making a discussion-thread, I get no notification of that. [*] If you have the solution for a problem, please post it to the GitHub repository. [*] Use [url=https://github.com/RimSort/RimSort/releases/latest]RimSort[/url] to sort your mods [/list]
